description: A rich collection of Prometheus metrics from NGINX Plus Kubernetes Ingress Controller

panels.description: Status of the last NGINX Plus reload.
panels.title: NGINX Plus Reload

panels.description: Number of successful NGINX Plus reloads.
panels.title: Reloads

panels.description: Number of unsuccessful NGINX Plus reloads.
panels.title: Reload Errors

panels.description: Bytes received from clients and sent to clients.
panels.title: Network I/O

panels.description: Total http requests per second looking back over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: HTTP Request Volume

panels.description: Total http requests per second looking back over the last 5 minutes across all server zones.
panels.title: Zone Request Volume

panels.description: Current State of the NGINX Ingress Controller.
panels.title: Ingress State

panels.description: Non-4|5xx response status codes divided by total number of response status codes.
panels.title: Request Success Rate

panels.description: Current State of the upstream servers.
panels.title: Upstream Server State

title: NGINX Plus Ingress Controller
